reference.shortdesc: The partno element represents a part number.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The partno element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the hardware domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code samples show how partno can be used to identify part numbers within text.
example.codeblock: The basic model, DB-123-456, is an entry model. Most users can take advantage of all features with little to no set up. The DB-123-456 is available with all systems.
<step> <cmd>Place the replacement <hwcontrol>Component <partno>DB-123-789</partno></hwcontrol> in the slot and secure with the 4 screws.</cmd> </step>
